com.isotrol.impe3.gui.common.util
Class Util

java.lang.Object
  com.isotrol.impe3.gui.common.util.Util

public final class Util
extends Object

Utility class that is able to:

  • display an animated info popup that fades out some time after it is displayed;
  • configure components for lazy initialization;
  • check empty strings;
  • fire Change events for passed components;
  • compute the base for the web application
  • compute the screen width
  • mask and unmask the viewport with a passed message

Author:
Andrei Cojocaru

error

public final void error(String message)
Displays an alert as a modal dialog. The alert dialog has the word "Error" for header, and displays the passed message in its body.

Parameters:
message -

error

public void error(String message,
                  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.event.Listener<com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.event.MessageBoxEvent> callback)
Displays a GXT alert box titled "Error", and binds it to the passed callback. The alert popup is modal, and its title is internationalized.

Parameters:
message - will be displayed as the alert box content.
callback - may be null

Additionally, configures the passed field to be validated when rendered.
